experience.organization: Training and Placement Cell, IIIT Naya Raipur
experience.description: Coordinated campus recruitment drives and managed logistics for interviews and placement sessions. Acted as a liaison between companies and students, ensuring alignment between hiring needs and student profiles. Streamlined the placement process by introducing new tools and methodologies for effective communication and scheduling.

experience.organization: The Society of Coders, IIIT Naya Raipur
experience.description: Led the organization and management of multiple coding contests and hackathons, including the development of questions and judging criteria. Mentored junior students in coding and problem-solving, conducted workshops, and provided guidance on improving their programming skills. Fostered a collaborative environment to encourage learning and innovation among members.

Organized and executed various entrepreneurship-related events, including workshops, seminars, and guest lectures. Managed public relations efforts, including promoting events through social media and coordinating with external partners. Gained experience in event planning, team collaboration, and stakeholder communication.
